QuestData.Title: Wash Out
QuestData.Description: Delicious!$B$BAzy always trying to get his hands on magic artifacts. Said he was trying to make friends with that archmage person. Xylem!$B$BXylem has LOTS of apprentices. Takes in all kinds, burns'm out, leaves them wandering all over. High turnover.$B$BLast one was last night. Headed over towards that big goblin tower construction thing, way west. Maybe he'll help you meet Xylem? Maybe Xylem knows where Azy is?$B$BPlay nice!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Sorata Firespinner at the Northern Rocketway Exchange.
QuestData.RewardText: Look buddy, I was in your shoes not a week ago. Big powerful Archmage actually takes on apprentices! Who could pass up an opportunity like that?!$B$BSometimes, things really are just too good to be true.
